column1: Little Goat Diner////I LOVE this place. The food is on another level. My favorite would have to be the dark chocolate chip crunch pancakes and their chocolate malt shake. That's my go-to for breakfast
column3: or dinner when I'm there. The Los Drowned sandwich is also amazing as are their fries. My fiance once had their famous Goat Almighty burger which is like $20 - it is massive and looks like a heart attack
column4: he loved every bit of it. EXTREMELY friendly service. I could be there with 1 other person or a party of 12 and they are so attentive and friendly. Would highly recommend.
